H0.text: Name the year: Hirohito dies; The Exxon Valdez runs aground; San Francisco suffers its worst earthquake since 1906.. 1975

H1.text: Name the year: Hirohito dies; The Exxon Valdez runs aground; San Francisco suffers its worst earthquake since 1906.. 1985

H2.text: Name the year: Hirohito dies; The Exxon Valdez runs aground; San Francisco suffers its worst earthquake since 1906.. 1987

H3.text: Name the year: Hirohito dies; The Exxon Valdez runs aground; San Francisco suffers its worst earthquake since 1906.. 1989

A4.text: On 8 January 1989, the Heisei era began, and from 7 January to 31 January, Hirohito was referred to as 'Departed Emperor' (大行天皇, Taikō-tennō).
